#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
vector<ll> v;
vector<ll> :: iterator it;
ll solve(ll n,ll s){
  if(n>s)
    return -1;
  if(n==s)
    return 0;
  it=lower_bound(v.begin(),v.end(),s-n);
  ll i=it-v.begin();
  i++;
  return i;
}
int main(){
  ll t,n,k,i,s,p;
  p=0;
  for(i=2;i<=1000000;i++){
     p+=i;
     v.push_back(p);
  }  
  scanf("%lld",&t);
  while(t--){
    scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&k);
    s=k*(k+1)/2;
    printf("%lld\n",solve(n,s));
  }
  return 0;
}
